type.description: Menu button type, same as Button component (only valid if 'split-button' is true)
type.description_zh: 菜单按钮类型，同 Button 组件(只在`split-button`为 true 的情况下有效)

size.description: Menu size, which also works for trigger buttons if 'split-button' is true
size.description_zh: 菜单尺寸，在 split-button 为 true 的情况下也对触发按钮生效。

max-height.description: The maximum height of the Menu

split-button.description: Drop-down trigger elements are rendered as groups of buttons
split-button.description_zh: 下拉触发元素呈现为按钮组

placement.type: top / top-start / top-end / bottom / bottom-start / bottom-end

trigger.description: Triggers the act of pulling down

hide-on-click.description: Whether to hide the menu after clicking on the menu item
hide-on-click.description_zh: 是否在点击菜单项后隐藏菜单

:show-timeout.description: Expand the delay of the drop-down menu (only valid if the trigger is hover)
:show-timeout.description_zh: 展开下拉菜单的延时（仅在 trigger 为 hover 时有效）

:hide-timeout.description: Collapse drop-down menu delay (only works when trigger is hover)
:hide-timeout.description_zh: 收起下拉菜单的延时（仅在 trigger 为 hover 时有效）

role.description: The ARIA role attribute for the dropdown menu. Depending on the use case, you may want to change this to 'navigation' | string
role.description_zh: 下拉菜单的 ARIA 属性。 根据具体场景，您可能想要将此更改为“navigation”

popper-class.description: Custom class name for Dropdown's dropdown

teleported.description: Whether the dropdown popup is teleported to the body
teleported.description_zh: 是否将下拉列表插入至 body 元素

events.name: click
events.description: 'split-button' is true, click the callback of the button on the left
events.description_zh: `split-button` 为 true 时，点击左侧按钮的回调

events.name: command
events.description: Click on the event callback triggered by the menu item
events.description_zh: 点击菜单项触发的事件回调

events.name: visible-change
events.description: Triggered when the drop-down box appears/hides
events.params: 出现则为 true，隐藏则为 false
events.description_zh: 下拉框出现/隐藏时触发

slots.name: dropdown
slots.description_zh: 下拉列表，通常是 <el-dropdown-menu> 组件
